I

ifsf routine in ifsf.pro

This procedure is the core routine to fit the continuum and emission lines of a spectrum.

ifsf.pro .pro file in common/ directory
ifsf_addpoly2temp routine in ifsf_addpoly2temp.pro

Add smooth functions to stellar continuum templates for spectral fitting: polynomials of form x^i (i.e., 1, x, x^2, etc.), their array reversals in wavelength space (i.e., reverse(x), etc.), and optionally 8 exponentials (of form +/-e^-x, +/-e^-2x, +/-e^-4x, +/-e^-8x).

ifsf_addpoly2temp.pro .pro file in common/deprecated/ directory

varext keyword in routine ifsf_readcube in file ifsf_readcube.pro

Extension # of variance plane.

velsig keyword in routine ifsf_cmplin in file ifsf_cmplin.pro

Set if line sigma in PARAM array is in velocity space (km/s).

verbose keyword in routine ifsf in file ifsf.pro

Print error and progress messages.

verbose keyword in routine ifsfa in file ifsfa.pro

Print error and progress messages.

wave parameter in routine ifsf_cmpnad in file ifsf_cmpnad.pro

Wavelength array over which to compute profile.

Wavelengths

Wavelengths

Wavelengths of data to fit.

Wavelengths.

wave parameter in routine ifsf_refinestz in file ifsf_refinestz.pro

Wavelengths of spectrum.

wavenorm parameter in routine ifsf_pltnaddat in file ifsf_pltnaddat.pro

Wavelength array of normalized data.

waveran keyword in routine ifsf_sepfitpars in file ifsf_sepfitpars.pro

Set to upper and lower limits to return line parameters only for lines within the given wavelength range.

Weights of spectrum to fit.

weq keyword in routine ifsf_cmpnadfull in file ifsf_cmpnadfull.pro

Return equivalent width computed from fitted profile.
